methods.allowKeyOnlySubstitution:
Should we allow substitution with a KeyOnlyAggregationFactory (e.g. selectDistinct) when there are only
 key columns? Instances whose operators could have side effects or are already KeyOnlyAggregationFactory
 should return false.

:return: (boolean) Whether to allow a KeyOnlyAggregationFactory to be substituted for this when there are only key
         columns

methods.makeAggregationContext:
Make an AggregationContext for this aggregation.

:param inputTable: (io.deephaven.db.tables.Table) - The source Table to aggregate
:param groupByColumnNames: (java.lang.String...) - The key column names
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.by.AggregationContext) A new or safely reusable AggregationContext

text: An AggregationContextFactory used in the implementation of Table.by(io.deephaven.db.v2.by.AggregationStateFactory, io.deephaven.db.v2.select.SelectColumn...).
